headline.main: The Afghan Front: Lessons of Vietnam

lead_paragraph: To the Editor: ''A Military Quagmire Remembered: Afghanistan as Vietnam'' (news analysis, Oct. 31) reminds us about the parallels with Vietnam but understates our failure once again to define our real goal. This goal should be: diminish hatred of our country, and thus diminish terrorism.
abstract: Wayne C Booth letter on parallels between United States' involvement in Afghanistan and Vietnam (Oct 31 news analysis)
